comments:

Did that cause any problem with project import? 

The setProjectDescription currently operates in the way that it first tries to acquire the root rule in order to store the project information and in case it fails, the job with the root rule is scheduled. So the IllegalArgumentException caused by the inability to acquire the root in this case is not a bug actually.
other then the error dialog showing up, it looks like the import continued.

This should be fixed now. Could you verify?

Mikhail
